name: Arani
0:
”Alexa, ask arani to turn off bedroom light”
”Alexa, ask arani to turn on bedroom light”
”Alexa, ask arani to dim bedroom light to fifty percent”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: arani
des:
With Arani, you can now voice control your home appliances by simply saying: 

On/Off
"Alexa, ask arani to turn on bedroom light"
"Alexa, ask arani to turn off bedroom light"

Brightness
"Alexa, ask arani to dim bedroom light to fifty percent"

Color
"Alexa, ask arani to set bedroom light to green"

Color Temperature
"Alexa, ask arani to set bedroom light to warm white"

Timer
"Alexa, ask arani to turn off bedroom light after ten minutes"

Scene
"Alexa, ask arani to bedroom light to flash"

To get started:
1, You'll need a Arani Light.
2, Set it up to Wi-Fi network(has internet access) by using our Arani APP which can be downloaded at Google Play or App Store. 

After that you can start using the skill given that you have already linked your account to it.
